movie:95b8725b-99cb-4a40-81ec-e8291e1078.overview: Vignettes weaving together the stories of six individuals in the old West at the end of the Civil War. Following the tales of a sharp-shooting songster, a wannabe bank robber, two weary traveling performers, a lone gold prospector, a woman traveling the West to an uncertain future, and a motley crew of strangers undertaking a carriage ride.
movie:95b8725b-99cb-4a40-81ec-e8291e1078.reelgood_synopsis: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs featuring Tim Blake Nelson and James Franco is streaming with subscription on Netflix. It's a drama and mystery movie with a better than average IMDb audience rating of 7.3 (128,363 votes) and was very well received by critics.
